body:
Yeah, it's been 3 years now. Exactly. 3. Years. :)



Ask me literally anything!
If you want opinions, put a * in front of it for brutal honest opinions and if you want opinions as a person/player/staff member etc.

Joke questions get joke answers!
Let's go!

Let's go!

replies.body:
*opinions
Very toxic girl, however has a heart, you just need to find it :'). The memes are 10/10. I didn't like you since idk how many days now, but after I was demoted, it got way worse. When you however told me your real age, I knew you were just a troll in the internet and my respect dropped a lot, lol. Also, after I got into Cacalmarin, we had lots of fun scrims, I enjoyed playing in your team. Now, I think we're good? and I would love if you wouldn't abuse your screenshots in the future :> don't hurt me pls

am i your best friend
No.

replies.body:
Are you gay?
No.

Honest opinions
Same with emily, I thought you were older for a very long time, idk why. I always had some respect for you because your pvp skills were amazing, and they still are. You're a fun person and I'm glad that I was invited into your team. I really would love if you play each scrim real and not just for fun, like you did in the previous ones. Overall good friend with nice pvp skills.

Admily? (True lovebirds l0l)
No.

Hows life
Great. Holidays start next week and I'm really hyped for the outcome of my application and for the Xbox I'll get for christmas.

How many times can i make you do what i want until u start ddosing me?
Depends on the severity of the things I should do and if my application will get accepted or not, xd. I'll get myself a new VPS after christmas too, a 1gbps one. They're really good at ddosing.

replies.body:
*Opinions?
First off, I don't know you as well as others because you're never on TS or ingame. The opinion is based off of your slack behaviour.
You seem to be a nice guy on Slack and you always give your opinions on different happenings. I like that. (Sorry, that's all. I would love to give more opinions but I can't becuase I don't know much about you :/)

If you could eliminate one weakness or limitation in your life, what would it be?
Uhm... probably my laziness.

What would you name the autobiography of your life?
I think I'm too young for an autobiography at this point of my life. xD

If you could say something in two words to your younger self, what would you say?
This is a hard one!
Probably "Follow rules!" because not following the rules got me into a lot of trouble sometimes. :^)

replies.body:
*Opinions?
You were always a great friend back in the days when you weren't banned, and I remember lots of fun scrims with your team. Sometimes, tbh, I didn't know who you were because you always change your name, and I have to namemc' it to find out you're Dawson. xD Also, back in the days I didn't like your toxic behaviour in scrims and general, because it always got you in trouble which hurt the team, but I'm sure you changed in the time being banned and that you can be nice to everyone, not only your team mates. :)

replies.body:
*Opinions?
You're a great mod. Back in my trial, I used to ask you lots of questions and you didn't just answer them, you also gave me optional tips and feedback, which I really appreciated. :) That of course, makes you a nice person from my point of view. I had a few laughs when you were on TS and when we were moderating together, but you never heard them. :P

If you ever come back as Junior, what are your plans?
As a Junior, I will first thank each Sr. Mod and Admin that they gave me another chance and I'd probably just do the same job I did last time. But of course, I would try to always act as a Junior/staff member and be more respectful towards other moderators/staff members. If you want to know more, just read my application, you have permissions to do it.

What motivates you to play Avicus?
Back in the days where prestiges were still a thing, the prestiges of course. I always played and played just to get as much XP as possible. There were fun gamemods such as Red Alert, Minotaur, OITC (It had another name) and of course DTM with lots of great maps. (Quintus, Original Luar, Ternio, Ravaged etc.) Today, to be honest, the biggest reason I'm still playing is that I want to become staff members to help the mods with their inactivity problem and just to help other players who need help. If I wouldn't have that reason, I'd probably be very inactive and just come on at special events and scrims. Right now, I'm a little bit hyped about Arcade too. I know it won't get played very often but it's still nice to have it back!

Favorite number?
I don't have one (right now) but if I must say one, it'd be 142 because it's at the end of one of my usernames. xD

replies.body:
*Opinions
I know you're a great redstone engineer. I remember when you once built an automated machine with redstone in a DTM match, but I forgot what it actually was for. xD I've seen you quite some times now while scrimming, but I never really got to have some conversations with you, so I can't really give you many opinions. :/ What I can say is, that you're sometimes salty, if I recall, but definitely not a salty person. I'm looking forward to play some more scrims against you! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Opinions? :D
You were probably my #1 staff buddy back in our trials. I remember many times when we both were the only two mods online, and we had to deal with everything by ourselves. :P I like your person; you're very friendly and always help players when they need help. I'd love to moderate with you again :PP
